title: Online Dialogue and Reflection-Based Learning Program for Career Counselor Professional Development

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational Career Counseling Theory and Practical Experience
context.additional_context: Practice-oriented program designed for career counselors in mathematics fields to develop expertise while adapting to the changing professional landscape. Includes VR simulations for real counseling scenarios and supports personal/professional identity transformation through online dialogue and reflection

learning_goals: Career counselors can diagnose career-related issues in evolving work environments and propose solutions using VR simulations.
Participants can strengthen self-awareness of their career counseling expertise and develop improvement plans through online discussions and reflective activities.
Learners can perform real-world case analyses and propose specific career counseling strategies through project-based assessments.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
